DDSPropertyQosPolicyHelper Class Reference
[PROPERTY]

Policy Helper. The policy helper facilitates the management of the properties in the input policy. More...

 Gets the number of properties in the input policy.

 Retrieves a list of properties whose names match the input prefix.

Detailed Description

Policy Helper. The policy helper facilitates the management of the properties in the input policy.
